Name: FOSUN INTERNATIONAL LTD
RED MOUNTAIN CAPITAL PARTNERS LLC
WYNNEFIELD CAPITAL INC
PRESCOTT GROUP CAPITAL MANAGEMENT, L.L.C.
PARADIGM CAPITAL MANAGEMENT INC/NY
Description: Fosun International Limited is a Chinese conglomerate and investment company. Founded in 1992 by Guo Guangchang and four others, the company is headquartered in Shanghai and was incorporated in Hong Kong in 2004. Its Co-CEOs are Xu Xiaoliang and Chen Quiyu. Wang Qunbin joined Guo Guangchang as Co-Chairman in early 2020. The company is located in 16 countries and is one of the largest privately owned conglomerates in China. It was ranked 416th on the Forbes Global 2000 ranking in 2018.
